name: Gardening Game (Prototype)
description:
a game about doing some gardening.

a game about making a nice garden.

How to play:
check how the different plants grow by clicking the "menu" button.
move the different plants from the bottom to the garden grid.
click "grow" to have the plants grow according to their rules.
after growing you can move the plants around.
repeat.
The game ends after 3 days.
how many of each different plant determines your score

I can only build it for macOS at the moment. hopefully windows and linux builds will come soon.
